about.text: Frontend Developer with more then two years of experience in leveraging JavaScript/TypeScrypt frameworks to build responsive websites, web applications, and interactive features that drive business growth.
In development I use tools such as React/Angular, Typescript, Redux/NGRX, Axios, SCSS/Tailwind Node.js, Express.js, Webpack, ESLint, Git.

experience.title: Website development for TLS ENG
experience.description: The site was developed based on the Bootstrap framework. JQuery and popper.js were used for user interaction. Working with Figma layout Working in a team with a designer.

experience.title: Website development for Language Solutions
experience.description: The site was developed based on the Bootstrap + lottiefiles Player framework. To interact with the server and database, the OctoberCMS framework was used on the Laravel (PHP) backend.

experience.title: News editor app of BISC Portal
experience.description: Development of an HTML elements editor for a news portal. Application based on React, TypeScript, ReactHooks, Swiper, BeautifulDND, TipTap, Tailwind.

experience.title: Development and support of a corporate portal of BISC
experience.description: Optimization, development of services widgets and additional functionality. Used Angular 16, NGRX, ViewportScroller, Tailwind.

experience.title: Website development for Lukan.by
experience.description: Website development using React. Participated in the development of components, a search engine, and a site navigation system. Working with API, database. Admin panel develop.

experience.title: Website development for Eventtochka.by
experience.description: Website development using React. Interface development, SEO, animation for Lotifiles.

experience.title: Fitness service GYM-Rat (suspended)
experience.description: Developed using Next.js/TypeScript. Development architecture based on FSD. Styling done using TailwindCSS. Interaction with REST API, data fetching and distribution done with TanstackQuery. Redux was not used. Database based on noSQL/MongoDB and Mongoose library. Monolithic architecture. OAuth authorization without additional integrations (temporarily).

experience.title: Reactive component library - IO
experience.description: Fully developed and designed. Task prioritization in task manager. Development of the library core, main components, and additional modules. Mentoring in the team. TypeScript was used in development without third-party libraries. ESLint, Prettier, Husky were used for code quality control.
